## Description {#details}

Helpers for implementing custom <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy">MachineSchedStrategy</a> classes.

These take care of the book-keeping associated with list scheduling heuristics. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/readyqueue">ReadyQueue</a> encapsulates vector of &quot;ready&quot; SUnits with basic convenience methods for pushing and removing nodes. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/readyqueue">ReadyQueue</a>&#39;s are uniquely identified by an <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a26a3c0b6567d1e8cf9ac8492e6e5f62f">SUnit::NodeQueueId</a> is a mask of the ReadyQueues the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> is in.

This is a convenience class that may be used by implementations of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy">MachineSchedStrategy</a>.

Definition at line 549 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinescheduler-h">MachineScheduler.h</a>.
